marklogic.body:
Ok lets get real here....any of you who have been in or seen a fight where someone gets a bloody or broken nose.....there is usually ALOT of blood....on the shirt etc.
I mean my sons friend gets random nose Bleeds and it is a mess.....
ask any doctor ....for whatever reason the head area Always Bleeds more profusely than other parts of the body
So if Zimmerman had a bloody nose and a cracked skull he should have some blood on him...
Unless the EMT's provided dry cleaning services.....his story smells to high heaven
